pkgmetadata.longdescription: # thanosql-magicSmartMind `ThanoSQL` Ipython Magic for Jupyter Lab## Installation```$ pip install thanosql-magic```## Quick Start1. load extension ```python %load_ext thanosql ```2. change default API uri (optional) ```python %thanosql http://localhost:8000/api/v1/query ```3. use magic ```python %%thanosql SELECT * FROM users ```## License[MIT](LICENSE)
